txt.en:
'Surely you have been informed of the incursion? This is drastic news. I fear this small force is just a scouting party. Many more will follow, far more than we can handle in open combat.

'If we are to defeat them we must know what their goal is. Where in Evendim are they going? Why are they coming now? What is going on to prompt this?

'Head to the small encampment in Tham Ornen. Our scouts witnessed the angmarim tacking things to the walls there. I believe it to be copies of plans and discovered information. Gather up several of these and bring them back to me.'
'So, they are heading to Annuminas itself and are seeking something within the ancient flooded ruins. Fortunately, it looks like we have some time to prepare before the main force arrives.'
'We cannot go into battle against Angmar blind. We must know what they are after.'
Tham Ornen has been occupied by forces from Angmar. What value they see in the ruins is unknown.
Tham Ornen is north east of Tinnudir.\n\nNadfaron asked you to venture to Tham Ornen and gather orders from the Angmarim camp.
Nadfaron is at Tinnudir, south west of Tham Ornen.\n\nNadfaron will be eager to examine the orders you found at the Angmarim camp in Tham Ornen.
